shortcv.p: Mina Moraiti is a graduate of the Department of Management Science and Technology in Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB). She is a part-time student of the International MBA Program of AUEB. She has a Certificate of Advanced English as well as a Certificate of D.E.L.F.2nd degre in French. She has worked at the Business Development and Customer Care Departments of Piraeus Direct Services (Piraeus Group). Her research interests are on the e-learning field and she is currently working as a research assistant in ISTLab/OIS.
